keyMappings:
map J Go back in history
map K Go forward in history

map H Go one tab left
map L Go one tab right
searchEngines:
# w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia
w: https://ja.m.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?search=%s&ns0=1 Wikipedia
g: https://www.google.co.jp/search?q=%s Google
# a: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
a: https://www.amazon.co.jp/s?k=%s&__mk_ja_JP=%E3%82%AB%E3%82%BF%E3%82%AB%E3%83%8A&ref=nb_sb_noss_2 Amazon
m: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
e: https://eo.jp/content/%s Weblio


# More examples.
#

# above, and for these.)
